name: AyahuasCat
description: Deep down in the Peruvian jungle, where he went to purify his spirit an clear his troubles, "Mathias" drank a ritual beverage, which in his mind, morphed him into a baby cat, running down through the seven circular paths of hallucination, where he will face his demons and fight his phobias. While trying to stay the less time possible in that state of mind, he will have to avoid staying there forever, improve his state of mind to be down to earth.
